title: Evisu Denim Script
content:
Hello Typos!  
I’m looking for the name of this script typeface to  
use for a Denim exhibition we are working on.  
Or something similar a fat script face really.  
The final thing will be embroidered so it needs to have body.  
Thanks in advance. Mr B

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035908im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Dragon_tee_front_large_4954.jpg)

 [‹ Name of types s.XX](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45320 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID this font please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905035908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45316 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mr Brown

comments.content: Bello by Underware might fit the bill?
